summary: Add some sophisticated visual styling to your game with this custom crafted and unique ENBseries adaptations for SKYRIM.   With many added features not included with the default ENBseries mod.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/822-1-1332365795.jpg[/img]
[center][b][size=5] SESFX 2.0 Preview - Day / Night Cycle Video
[youtube]c76zaGpzoq0[/youtube]

How ENB Effects Combine to Improve Image Quality
[youtube]UoeeRpAEv58[/youtube]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/822-2-1332365797.jpg[/img][/size][/b][/center]

[b][size=5][color=deepskyblue]-- SKYRIM ENHANCED SHADERS --[/color][/size][/b]
An ENBseries adaptation by Tapioks at www.SkyrimNexus.com
ENBseries created by Boris Vorontsov @ www.enbdev.com
LATEST SUPPORTED ENBSERIES VERSION: TES Skyrim 13713

[color=lime]NOTE:[/color] You can get the ENB 13713 d3d9.dll from here if not available at ENBdev.com: [url=http://www.tapioks.com/ENB_149_d3d9.zip]www.tapioks.com/filehosting/ENB_13713_d3d9.zip[/url]

[b][size=3][color=deepskyblue]>> OVERVIEW:[/color][/size][/b]

This mod adds a number of sophisticated customizable visual effects to your game using ENBseries technology. This collection of files and settings has been carefully crafted and configured in the interest of making it easy to get great looking results.
[color=lime]NOTE: The FULL version of the mod has a couple bugs as of the Skyrim 1.5 Patch (i.e. grass-ghosting and underwater visibility). Download the new 2.0 PREVIEW version in the UPDATES section for a version of the mod that addresses these issues[/color]

[b][size=3][color=deepskyblue]>> See the included User Guide for full details![/color][/size][/b]

[b][size=3][color=deepskyblue]>> TRAILER:[/color][/size][/b]

[youtube]WYc2VAQqp74[/youtube]

Be sure to watch in HD!! A million thanks to [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/1645524-thenannymoh]thenannymoh[/url] for his amazing video work!
Give him a bunch of Kudos and give his video a thumbs up on [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WYc2VAQqp74&hd=1]YouTube[/url] :)

[b][size=3][color=deepskyblue]>> FAN DEMO VIDEOS:[/color][/size][/b]

[youtube]m0eYMxZYIHU[/youtube]

A wonderful video by mod fan [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=2388835]hodilton[/url] showing the effect of the mod during different tiems of day in Riverwood!


[youtube]VrAJHgnMS-o[/youtube]

A great video by Archeagus showcasing SES FX 1.0


Thank you to the following handsome/beautiful Nexus members for their contribution to the cause:

- Andrew Eckel
- Douglas Franklin
- Darren Jacobs
- Bjoern Hausmann
- Nathan Bridgeman
- Anne Cathrine Syversen
- Brandon Manuel
- Timothy Gage
author: Tapioks
